lastMessage:
feat(blog-feed): remove legacy versions and implement minimal scaffold

- Deleted all previous blog feed widget versions (v1 to v3.3.0).
- Introduced a new minimal scaffold (v0.1.0) with static demo posts and a simple modal for design iteration.
- Updated TODOs to reflect the new structure and future enhancements.
- Ensured compliance with workspace policy to maintain a single active version.
